name: Puma Basket Classic
description: The Puma Basket Classic is a casual sneaker with a timeless design that features a clean and simple leather upper.

name: New Balance 990v4
description: The New Balance 990v4 is a comfortable and supportive running shoe that features a durable pigskin and mesh upper.

name: Saucony Jazz Original Vintage
description: The Saucony Jazz Original Vintage is a classic running sneaker that features a combination of suede and nylon in the upper.

name: Adidas Originals SL 72
description: The Adidas Originals SL 72 is a retro running sneaker that features a lightweight and breathable nylon upper.

name: Reebok Classic Leather
description: The Reebok Classic Leather is a versatile sneaker that features a soft and supportive leather upper.

name: Asics Gel-Kayano 5 OG
description: The Asics Gel-Kayano 5 OG is a retro running sneaker that features a unique design with a bulky silhouette and a combination of leather and mesh in the upper.

name: Fila Original Fitness
description: The Fila Original Fitness is a retro tennis sneaker that features a clean and simple design with a leather upper and perforated details.

name: Nike Air Max 270 React ENG
description: The Nike Air Max 270 React ENG combines a full-length React foam midsole with a 270 Max Air unit for unrivaled comfort and style.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 features a sleek design with a lightweight, breathable upper and responsive Boost midsole for a comfortable ride.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
description: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star is a classic sneaker that pairs well with any outfit.

name: New Balance Fresh Foam 1080v11
description: The New Balance Fresh Foam 1080v11 is designed with a precision-engineered Fresh Foam midsole that delivers an ultra-cushioned, lightweight ride.

name: Puma Cali Sport Mix
description: The Puma Cali Sport Mix is a modern take on the classic Puma California sneaker, featuring a mix of materials and bold color blocking.

name: Reebok Classic Leather Legacy
description: The Reebok Classic Leather Legacy features a clean, timeless design with a soft leather upper and a cushioned EVA midsole for all-day comfort.

name: Vand Old Skool
description: The Saucony Jazz Original Vintage is a retro-inspired sneaker
